basics.name: Rade Bajic
basics.current: Team Lead / Senior Expert @ Strabag SE
basics.summary: Experienced civil engineer specializing in delay analysis, scheduling, and FIDIC contracts. Currently pursuing my third master’s degree in Data Analytics at Georgia Tech, with a focus on integrating data-driven insights into construction management.

work.name: Strabag SE
work.summary: Leading a team focused on delay analysis, claim management, risk management, and dispute resolution in large-scale construction projects. Providing expertise on FIDIC contracts and managing project risks across international projects. Overseeing multiple dispute resolution processes, including quality assurance, cost-effective case management and selection of external experts. Providing extensive support to project teams in contract negotiations and dispute avoidance. Training junior staff on delay analysis and contract management. Holding training on FIDIC contracts, delay analysis and dispute resolution.

work.name: CML Construction Services GmbH
work.position: Testifying Expert Witness on Delay & Quantum
work.summary: Serving as an expert witness in delay and quantum matters, with a strong focus on ICC arbitration and international dispute resolution. Extensive experience in mediation, litigation, and acting as an expert before Dispute Adjudication Boards and International Arbitration Tribunal. I have been cross-examined in ICC arbitration hearing, participated in hot-tubbing, and contributed to joint expert reports.

work.name: AzWirt
work.summary: As the main contractor, managed a €400 million large-scale highway project, which included NATM tunnels, 60+ structures, and a bridge over 1 km long, all within a challenging geotechnical environment and involving multiple subcontractors. Focused on contract management, budgeting, and cost control. Oversaw the project schedule, prepared Extension of Time (EOT) claims, contributed to budgeting, and actively monitored project performance to ensure alignment with targets.

work.name: RZD
work.summary: Led technical office activities for a major railway construction project. Responsibilities included managing work preparation, program management, quantity surveying, and ensuring compliance with quality assurance protocols.

work.name: Integral Engineering
work.summary: Handled project engineering tasks, including site management, work preparation, and cost estimation for tendering processes in various construction projects.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
